title: Bob Iger at Code 2022
summary:
Bob Iger, the former CEO and Chairman of The Walt Disney Company, speaks with Kara Swisher at Code 2022. Kara and Bob discuss the winners and losers in the streaming wars, the future of movies, that time he almost bought Twitter, and what heâ€™s up to in retirement.
Recorded on September 6 in Los Angeles.
